entry.title: Tether Has Reduced Commercial Paper Backing USDT by 20% Since April
entry.summary: The world’s largest US dollar stablecoin, Tether (USDT), today announced its first attestation report in six months. The report disclosed that Tether had decreased its commercial paper holdings – short-term commercial debt – by 17% from December 2021 through March 2022, from $24.2B to $19.9B. entry.title: Terra Founder Faces Government Investigations, Lawsuits, and $78M Fine for Tax Evasion
